---
category: news
title: "Facebook open-sources Flores-101 dataset to enable more accurate AI translations"
excerpt: "Facebook Inc. today open-sourced a dataset called Flores-101 for use in the development of artificial intelligence models that translate text between different languages. Building an AI model involves training a neural network on a large amount of information until it learns to identify useful patterns."
